page.title: 15Farms around Nether Kellet
page.content: There are eight farms in this area. The most popular animals are cows and sheep which are kept mostly for breeding. The most widely used machine is the tractor and only one farm has a combine harvester. Of all the farms, Mr. Whitaker's is the largest with 360 acres. The oldest farm was built in the 17th century. Mr. Thomas from Green Bank Farm has been{farming}for ten years. His farm sells soft fruit (strawberries, rasberries, red currants, black currants and gooseberries). People can pick their own. The farmer at Mount Pleasant Farm has 2,000 pigs for breeding and 2,500 chickens for the table. Mr. Robinson from Kellet Bridge Farm has been{farming}for two and a half years. His farm has a camp site. There is also a holiday cottage at Lane End Farm.
